channel.title: Terence Young
channel.description: Recent news about Terence Young, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by InsideHalton.com
item.description:
Home Opinion Cell tower applications the exclusive jurisdiction...
Oakville Conservative MP Terence Young was confused about the Constitution and about what his job is when he wrote in these pages last week, “Towns do have some authority, and responsibility: to represent the views of local residents to Industry Canada.

item.title: Mentioned by InsideHalton.com
item.description:
Drug safety program a victory: MP
Oakville MP Terence Young reached the end of a long journey recently by announcing the launch of a Federal Government program to enhance drug safety for Canadians. The Plain Language Labelling Initiative aims to improve the safe use of drugs by ...

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: During this session of Parliament, we passed highest number of private member’s bills in one session in history.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Did you know we passed a record number of bills during this session of parliament. 37 bills received Royal Assent since January 1st, 2013.
